comments: Excellent teacher. Friday nights were so easy with her in class, we read the book, discuss it in class, write a paper on it...it was so laid back and it was just a relaxing class to take because of how organized she was, easy going, if you couldn\'t turn it in she would work with you to give you more time! Take her class! she is great!!!

Well she was a very good teacher,i mean once she gave us a holiday to work on our essays...... she gives us frequent brakes like every hour for 10 minutes....and well she is helpful and a jolly person...discusses a lot of things in class about current affairs...and also yea she is easy to get along with I really recommend her guys
